creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: seated soldier at center wearing armor and holding a black and gold fan with a red circle; young boy at left wearing white and green patterned kimono and breastplate; three other soldiers--one kneeling at right before central man and two seen 3/4 view from back in LLC; tree at left
markings: LRC, on red seal: 吉隆之印{Yoshitaka no in}
signed: LRC, in black: 雪佳筆{Sekka hitsu}
title: Kusunoki Masashige before the Battle at Minato River
